title: [K-12] Lesson Study-Based Teacher Perspective Transformation Strategies for Mathematics Teaching and Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of introductory educational theory or mathematics pedagogy
context.additional_context: Process for pre-service teachers and education majors to explore shifts in mathematics teaching-learning perspectives using Lesson Study (LS) methodology

learning_goals: Learners can explain the four-stage Lesson Study (LS) cycle (plan-do-observe-reflect) through real-world case applications
Learners can suggest three or more strategies for transitioning from traditional math instruction to learner-centered participatory classes
Learners can diagnose and reflect on their mathematics teaching perspectives through reflective journaling
Learners can design feedback protocols for collaborative instructional improvement with peer teachers
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
